translation.help:
Chemical Tools supports the following functions:
1. Element Search
Input element symbol/IUPAC name/atomic number to search a element. Input 'element' to see all elements.
e.g. 72
e.g. Hafnium
2. Mass Calculation
Input chemical formula to calculate the mass.
e.g. (NH4)6Mo7O24
3.Acid-Base Calculation
Input [HA (or BOH)] [Analytical concentration] [pKa (or pKb)] to calculate solution composition.
e.g. HA 0.1 2.148 7.198 12.319
4. Gas Calculation
Input unknown (p, V, n, T) and enter the known quantities in p, V, n, T in sequence to calculate the unknown.
e.g. n 101 1 298
5. Deviation Calculation
Enter a set of data to calculate its deviation.
e.g. 0.3414 0.3423 0.3407
translation.massper: {0}(Symbol: {2}), {3} atoms whose mass is {4}, with a mass fraction of {5}%;
translation.pH: The pH of the solution is {0}.
